# bm-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Html

```html
<bm-container>
  <bm-divider alignment="" color="is-primary" is-light="false" is-vertical="false"> OR </bm-divider>
</bm-container>
```



## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description | Type                                                       | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignment`  | `alignment`   |  Alignment  | `"is-left" \| "is-right"`                                  | `undefined` |
| `color`      | `color`       |  Color      | `"is-danger" \| "is-info" \| "is-success" \| "is-warning"` | `undefined` |
| `isLight`    | `is-light`    | IsLight     | `boolean`                                                  | `false`     |
| `isVertical` | `is-vertical` | IsVertical  | `boolean`                                                  | `false`     |
